abstract: Background: Individuals from minoritized racial and ethnic backgrounds experience pernicious and pervasive health disparities that have emerged, in part, from clinician bias. Objective: We used a natural language processing approach to examine …

title: Generalizable and Scalable Multistage Biomedical Concept Normalization Leveraging Large Language Models
abstract: Background: Biomedical entity normalization is critical to biomedical research because the richness of free-text clinical data, such as progress notes, can often be fully leveraged only after translating words and phrases into structured and coded …

title: Scalable Numerical Embeddings for Multivariate Time Series: Enhancing Healthcare Data Representation Learning
details: CK Huang, YH Hsieh, TJ Chien, LC Chien, SH Sun… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Multivariate time series (MTS) data, when sampled irregularly and asynchronously, often present extensive missing values. Conventional methodologies for MTS analysis tend to rely on temporal embeddings based on timestamps that necessitate …
